title: Watchmen Timeline Explained! Season 1 and Comic Connections
author: Think Story
comment: Hope you like this video guys. Consider giving it a like, it took awhile to put it all together. I couldn't include everything so let me know below what you think should be added for future timelines and while you're at it check out my Watchmen Season 1 Explained video :)
Thank you for calling it a massacre and not a riot, I appreciate that.
Loved the show but never understood how people found the timeline confusing. It was pretty easy to follow.
Seriously though, this is an awesome post finale recap.
7 years and given a horseshoe, lucky? Nope just the smartest man's plan coming together.
description:
Ever wonder how all the events of HBO's Watchmen the show fit into one timeline? We take a look in chronological order and explain the season's major events.
